posts.post_content: I know this is probably a long shot, but I’m looking for this N172 Old Judge William Traffley 462-6 to complete my pose run. If anyone knows someone that has this card, I’d be very interested. I already reached out to Jay and he helped me with a couple of the other poses, but still looking for this one.
I’m still looking for the 6th Bill Traffley pose if anyone has a lead on one. I’d really like to complete this pose run if possible.

Pm sent


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Found the final pose for my Traffley run. Thanks to Jay for helping me complete this pose run.
